extendedInfo.description: Box Fox is a 2D platformer with a heavy focus on puzzles, it takes inspiration from classics such as Incredible Machine and Block Dude, as well as modern games such as Portal and Minecraft.Features:-Lots of puzzle and platform elements including lasers, remote control cars, buttons, doors, springs, teleporters, pistons, movable bridges, keys, etc.-Challenging puzzles that aim to make you think, as well as easy levels for casual gamers.-All levels can be skipped. -Fullscreen support for honeycomb tablet devices.-37 levels, plus you can create and load your own custom levels.Email me if you have any problems or requests for the game.

reviews.title: Really good puzzles.
reviews.comment: I don\'t especially like virtual controls but with this game being more about puzzle solving than action, it doesn\'t matter so much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Muy completo
reviews.comment: Muchos elementos para combinar. Los puzzles est\303\241n bastante bien hechos y algunos son verdaderamente complicados. Adem\303\241s es posible crear niveles en el PC y pasarlos al m\303\263vil. Un juego fant\303\241stico que merecer\303\255a m\303\241s atenci\303\263n.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very fun mind game!
reviews.comment: Very nice job. I don\'t think you can beat level 11 easy though. The hole on the right is too small for the box to go through. ??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gordo
reviews.comment: Sweet game, my 8 and 10 year olds like it almost as much as I do. Challenging problem solving for all ages.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this game. Super addicting and challenging. Only thing that would be more fun is the ability to create our own levels. Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just finished the Lite version and HAD to get full version. Great game! Keep it up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game is flippin awesome!!! Very addicticve kills my phone everyday
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game, challenging and creative puzzles! Even better than the lite version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game in need of some fixes :3
reviews.comment: The game is great fun and the platforming and challenges are solid but all it needs is the ability to play in landscape mode and some tweaked and easier controls and boom, perfection :)
reviews.author: A Google User
